item.title: How to get the Spotify Refresh Token
item.description: Getting the Spotify Refresh Token doesn't need to be a hassle any longer.
item.author: danhtran.dev@outlook.com (Dan Tech)

item.title: Apple doesn't care about privacy, and it's showing.
item.description: Apple announced that it would begin checking content uploaded to iCloud Photos, against a list of known CSAM material. This is fine on it's own, however the system could easily be abused.
item.author: danhtran.dev@outlook.com (Dan Tech)

item.title: WWDC 2022 Wishlist
item.description: Even though I don't use any of their products myself, here's the features I hope Apple will announce.
item.author: danhtran.dev@outlook.com (Dan Tech)

item.title: Apple and the case for competition.
item.description: The EU announced plans to force all devices – including iPhones – to use a common charging port.
item.author: danhtran.dev@outlook.com (Dan Tech)
